title: Other computer has logged in to my account
body: I didn't tell my account details to anyone, but when i saw the message, i immediately changed my password. Am i safe now? Somebody sent me this: LINK evint 2016 rp 40 askins now free for....i dont want to show the link, but i clicked on it, and logged in to it, i knew, i cant have free RP, but....ahh. So am i safe now, with the PW change?

replies.body: I'm not judging but why would you click that?

Links to unidentified sites can be a risky click. If a site outside of the League site is asking for your League login details, you're probably best to stay away from it.

For some tips on keeping your account secure, take a look at the [Summoner Safety Initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664).

It looks like you are working with one of our specialists in a ticket already, so I recommend you continue to work with them to get your account secured.

Let me know if you have any questions.
